java/liquibase/change/DropDefaultValueChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DropDefaultValueStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00020 public class DropDefaultValueChange extends AbstractChange {
00021 
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String tableName;
00024     private String columnName;
00025 
00026     public DropDefaultValueChange() {
00027         super("dropDefaultValue", "Drop Default Value");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getTableName() {
00039         return tableName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00043         this.tableName = tableName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getColumnName() {
00047         return columnName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setColumnName(String columnName) {
00051         this.columnName = columnName;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00055 
00056         return new SqlStatement[]{
00057                 new DropDefaultValueStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnName()),
00058         };
00059     }
00060 
00061     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00062         return "Default value dropped from "+getTableName()+"."+getColumnName();
00063     }
00064 
00065     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00066         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00067 
00068         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00069             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00070         }
00071 
00072         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00073         node.setAttribute("columnName", getColumnName());
00074 
00075         return node;
00076     }
00077 
00078     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00079         Column column = new Column();
00080 
00081         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00082         column.setTable(table);
00083 
00084         column.setName(columnName);
00085 
00086         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(table, column));
00087 
00088     }
00089     
00090 }
